text: poona price soft and fluffy snowflake
bread with sweet chocolate picking
through this gorgeous party-ready bread
will bring your christmas guests
together there might be no snow in
tropical countries like vietnam but why
not making some snowflake bread to
celebrate winter and christmas with its
unique shapes the bread looks so good
and tastes even better let's begin
ingredients you will need 300 grams of
bread flour 30 gram powdered sugar 1
large egg 150 ml of warm milk 40 ml of
whipping cream 30 gram cream cheese 25
gram unsalted butter at room temperature
3 gram instant yeast
2 tbsp of powdered sugar a quarter
teaspoon salt 1 and a half teaspoon of
cinnamon powder 40 grams of chocolate
chip first combine the flour sugar yeast
and salt in a stand mixer and mix well
then crack in the eggs and add the warm
milk knead well for about 10 to 15
minutes with the stand mixer until the
dough is formed add butter and knead for
another 2-3 minutes until the dough is
nicely firm and isn't sticky to the
touch cover and proof for about 30 to 45
minutes
next combine chocolate whipping cream
and cream cheese in a bowl place this
bowl into a larger bowl of hot water
stir until homogeneous
after proofing the dough for about 45
minutes punch to deflect the dough
briefly knead for a few minutes then
divide into four equal portions shape
each piece into a nice bowl dust it with
flour and then roll out each piece of
dough into a round and thin disc
lay out the first dish of dough on a
baking tray light with parchment paper
spread 1 3 of the chocolate sauce all
over the surface of the disk leaving
about 1 inch empty around the rim
sprinkle half a teaspoon of cinnamon
powder use a pastry brush to brush some
water around the rim of the dough disk
then stack the other piece on top
pinch to stick the two dicks together
repeat with another layer of chocolate
sauce and then another disk of dough
when finished with all four layers pinch
the edges together
use a round object with about two inches
in diameter place in the center of the
disc and press down gently then use a
paring knife to cut the dough into 8
equal portions leaving the center part
untouched then divide each part in half
so you have 16 equal portions to turn
the dough into snowflakes pick up two
pieces of adjacent dough twist them
twice and then press the outer edges of
the two pieces together then repeat with
the remaining seven pairs of dough
wedges
and there you have cinnamon snowflake
bread now preheat the oven at 170
degrees celsius cover the dough and
leave to rest for about 20 minutes then
brush with milk and bake in the
preheated oven for 20 minutes
at 170 degrees celsius or 350 fahrenheit
and there you have it you can sprinkle
with some powdered sugar and serve with
a sideball of chocolate sauce the
cinnamon smells so good the bread is
poured apart soft and fluffy with the
beautiful richness from the cream cheese
and who can say no to extra chocolate i
hope this snowflake bread will warm up
your winter days and it could very well
become the centerpiece of your christmas
party i wish you happy holidays and
thank you for watching bye
[Music]
[Music]
you
